meanings.definition: Attending or going to the opera.
meanings.sent1: She is an operagoing enthusiast who never misses a performance.
meanings.sent2: The operagoing audience applauded loudly at the end of the show.
meanings.sent3: The operagoing couple dressed elegantly for the night at the opera.
meanings.sent4: Her operagoing experience was like stepping into a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The operagoing crowd was filled with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: The act of going to see an opera.
meanings.sent1: His operagoing involves attending multiple shows each season.
meanings.sent2: We planned our operagoing for next month's performance.
meanings.sent3: The operagoing group booked tickets for the upcoming opera night.
meanings.sent4: Her love for operagoing grew after her first visit to the opera house.
meanings.sent5: The operagoing experience left a lasting impression on her.
